headline: Beyond Big Tech: 6 other stock picks that are leveraging AI
summary: Lopez Research founder Maribel Lopez joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to explain how investors can invest in artificial intelligence (AI) beyond just Big Tech and infrastructure. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
